# BeatBind C# Project Instructions

This is a C# Windows Forms application for controlling Spotify through global hotkeys.

## Project Overview
- **Language**: C# (.NET 8.0)
- **UI Framework**: Windows Forms
- **Target**: Windows Desktop Application
- **Purpose**: Global hotkey control for Spotify Web API

## Key Features
- Global hotkey registration and handling
- Spotify Web API integration with OAuth
- System tray functionality
- Configuration management
- Audio control (play/pause, volume, seeking)
- Track management (save/remove)

## Next Steps
1. Install .NET 8.0 SDK from https://dotnet.microsoft.com/download/dotnet/8.0
2. Run `build.bat` or `dotnet build` to compile the project
3. Configure Spotify Developer App credentials
4. Run the application and test functionality
